title: Need help on a lookalike font like this
content:
Hi guys,

I need to find a font that looks like the one i've attached. Its a custom font, created for a magazine, so i cant use it or buy it.  
To me it looks a bit like Franklin Gothic, but more 'loose'.

Any ideas??

thx!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723062411im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font2_5635.jpg)
author: dannirid

comments.content:
Ray Larabie's [Wyvern](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723062411/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/wyvern/?refby=bowfin) is fairly close and comes in multiple weights. You could squeeze it a little, if you want it narrower.

- Mike Yanega

Some resources you may find helpful: [PintassilgoPrints](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723062411/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/PintassilgoPrints) Erica Jung and Ricardo Marcin, [Pablo Ferro-esque Monoline Hand Drawn](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723062411/http:/www.myfonts.com/users/ubjduiig5y/albums/602372) running list by Stephen Coles, [YWFT fonts tagged handwritting](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723062411/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/fonts/handwriting) (Hannah, Strangelove, Have A Nice Day...), [Benicassim Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723062411/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/german-leon/gl-benicassim)
